title: You should always build Morellonomicon instead of Liandry's Torment, even as DOT mage.
body:
You could buy both, but when the time you consider which you should build first, or build only one of them, this is the time for math to kick in.

Gold  cost : {{item:3165}}  3000 cheaper than {{item:3151}} 3100
Ap + Hp: Same.
{{item:3165}} 15 magic pen: +12.5% more magic damage against chamption has 35 magic resist (early game)
{{item:3151}} 2% damage per stack, at 5 stack + 10% damage. Requires 5 secs of combat. (so what im saying is even with full stack, {{item:3151}}  still deal less damage than {{item:3165}}  WHY???)

 ({{item:3165}}  deal more damage than {{item:3151}}  when target has less than **65 **magic resist, and** 108.3 **when you already have {{item:3135}}  (I wonder if tank ever build more than 2 magic resist item to make this happen anymore))
 => better early game, better bust, stack better with other magic pen items (which, you are going to build anyway).

{{item:3165}}  -40% healing vs {{item:3151}}  deal 1% max heal. 
If you ask me what is more strong, consider all mask man have part of their rune and lifesteal to be considered as healing, and lots of ~~tank ~~ tanky champions with high max health have healing in their kit {{champion:36}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:12}}, i will say {{item:3165}}  is better than {{item:3151}}.

{{item:3116}} {{item:3151}}  combo. Yes, it sound and feel strong, but answer me, can you, or the champion you are dealing with, live longer than 5 secs in this meta? Instead, try {{item:3165}} {{item:3116}}  combo (annoying debuff) or {{item:3165}} {{item:3151}} (unhealable) is much stronger. Or all 3 of them.

replies.body: Old discussion, but it's missing a thing so I'm adding it. {{item:3151}} is better on champs that have weak AoE spells, that are able to continuosly procuring it to many opponents. {{champion:63}}'s passive, it doesn't deal much damage, but it keeps the {{item:3151}}'s burning effect up. On these champs {{item:3151}} is a better item.

I know this thread is a little old so i'm sorry, but due to how little attention it got anyway i hope it's ok to leave a comment.

Morellonomicon does have the pen that Liandry's doesn't, and i could see how it would be better for straight up deleting squishes, but Liandry's passive's both make it much better for teamfight's. The longer the fight goes, your damage goes up by 10% already, and you also have a passive burn on top of that to help melt through tankier people. The flat pen on  {{item:3165}} is nice against people with low MR or just their base MR stat's, but against people stacking lot's of health or such, it isn't a lot of MP at all.

Im speaking mostly from the perspective of {{champion:34}} , since i have the most experience on her, but {{item:3151}} is sssooo nice on her since it basically just straight up increases the damage you deal with your blizzard, and you're already a great teamfight champ as it is.  just my thoughts.

Or.

You could just buy both items?

Instead of having to choose?

There is really no way to do this math on paper that reflects reality, because both passives on {{item:3151}} cannot be reduced to a percentage or any quantifiable value.

There are definitely cases where it would be better, but not a lot. Also note certain abilities refresh the DoT in odd ways.
